text:
Hi everyone, I am a content marketer with 5 years and 4 months of experience. For the past three years I have been extensively writing on topics such as digital adoption, digital transformation, contact center, conversational AI, chatbots, CRM, customer engagement, and customer experience. I'm currently looking out for opportunities to work as a freelance writer. It would be great if I could get some leads on the same. I can work 5-6 hours a week and I'm looking out for long term projects that revolve around the topics I've mentioned above. Please DM me in case you want to take a look at my writing samples. :slightly_smiling_face:
TIA!
